Name: Drive West Coast
About the game: In Drive: West Coast you can drift from densely wooded forests to the city streets to the coastline. There are 19 unique vehicles to unlock and collect by finding hidden keys and beating high scores. You can choose to race against the clock as you collect as many checkpoints as you can before time runs out. Or, you can choose to play more casually and explore the open world at your own speed.
